summary: Use the fabled Hover Boots for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/23769-1-1346997955.png[/img]
Use the fabled Hover Boots for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. They let you hover and they look great! 

Also, if you like this mod, be sure to check out my other mods by clicking [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1398716]here[/url] and clicking on the files tab. :D

Thank you!
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=twPcanjxFl4&feature=youtu.be][img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/23769-1-1347034787.png[/img][/url]
^Click the image to see a video Passet made to show the boots off. Thanks Passet! 
[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002745[/img] 


Merge the 'Data' folder with the 'Data' folder in your Skyrim folder.  
Don't forget to check on the esp: AK- Zelda Hover Boots.esp
You can find the boots in the test hall. Type "coc qasmoke" into the console to get there.

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002744[/img]
The hover boots were designed and created to be an item in the next release of my mod [url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18386]A Friend of Time.[/url] However, when I stumbled upon matt13382's incredible [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23977]Zelda Land of Hyrule mod[/url], I jumped on making the hover boots standalone in hopes that he can use them to further his noble cause. I give him permission to either rely on this mod, or absorb it's textures/meshes/scripts if he likes, so long as I am given proper credit. Here's to a complete Hyrule!

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002743[/img]
SKSE has added edit game settings: That means that as soon as I can find time I should be able to release Zelda's Iron Boots as well. :D

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002740[/img]

None at this point.

[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/15827-3-1336698265.png[/img]
I got the scriptiong idea from the great [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15775]Flying Mod Beta[/url]. I used the following line from one of his scripts: utility.SetIniFloat("fInAirFallingCharGravityMult:Havok",0)

I also want to thank Passet for his great showcase video. 
Thanks guys!

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002748[/img]

I am currently not posting any mods on Steam Workshop. If you see one of my mods on Steam Workshop, please report the file to me. 
Thank :D
author: Iceburg
